articles.title: Samsung hints at massive One UI 8 update wave in September - Sammy Fans
articles.description: Samsung is preparing for a massive wave of One UI 8 update rollout in September. Despite bringing another Beta update, the company is sticking to its Stable Android 16 update schedule, which will commence next month. Just recently, Samsung revealed that Stabl…
articles.content: It has been one month since the release of the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7 devices, and Samsung has shared some of the interesting software features powered by One UI 8. These two phones are the first… [+2637 chars]
